A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Ugh\, such a disapointment\, from the initial bad sarcasm between hux and poe to the end...it sucked. Everything with Finn and the Asian girl was lame and didn’t develop character. I briefly enjoyed the Skywalker fight\, but that’s it. Yoda added nothing. Laura derns character made no sense and Superman leia was an absolute terrible idea. Not excited for Star Wars anymore...
